geoEventService.name: Weather-Monitor-Service-DEMO
geoEventService.description: Demo Service for monitoring worker locations and weather events

input.connectorLabel: Watch a folder for new .csv files
input.name: file-csv-in

properties.property: This is a notification to inform you that field workers have departed from your project site.
This is a notification to inform you that field workers have arrived on your project site.
The National Weather Service has issued a Severe Thunderstorm Warning for your project area. Stop work and seek shelter now. Follow this link for more information ${WFILE}
The National Weather Service has issued a Tornado Warning for your project area. Stop work and seek shelter immediately. Follow this link for more information ${WFILE}

connector.label: Receive NMEA from a TCP Socket
connector.name: esri-in-tcp-nmea
connector.description: Receive NMEA sentences on a TCP Socket. The NMEA sentences supported include NMEAGPGGA, NMEAGPGLL, and NMEAGPRMC.

connector.label: Receive generic JSON via a WebSocket (SERVER)
connector.name: esri-in-websocket-json-server
connector.description: Listens for client connections and accepts client requests to connect to a server's WebSocket. Use this server inbound connector when a large number of clients need to push event data to GeoEvent Processor. The GeoEvent Processor will maintain a single WebSocket on the server.

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Receive generic JSON via a WebSocket (CLIENT)
connector.name: esri-in-websocket-json-client
connector.description: Initiates a client connection to a server's WebSocket. Use this client inbound connector to request connection to and retrieve data from a WebSocket hosted by the server running GeoEvent Processor.

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Send generic JSON to a WebSocket (SERVER)
connector.name: esri-out-websocket-json-server
connector.description: Listens for client connections and accepts client requests to connect to a server's WebSocket. Use this server outbound connector to push GeoEvents to a WebSocket hosted by the server running GeoEvent Processor. Clients can make connection requests and retrieve event data from the Output.

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Send generic JSON to a WebSocket (CLIENT)
connector.name: esri-out-websocket-json-client
connector.description: Initiates a client connection to a server's WebSocket. Use this client outbound connector when you want GeoEvent Processor to push event data out to a WebSocket hosted on another server.

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Publish Features to a Stream Layer
connector.name: websockets-streamlayer-output
connector.description: Use this outbound connector to push ESRI feature JSON to a websocket

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Receive Tweets
connector.name: twitter-in
connector.description: Receive tweets from twitter profiles or based on term(s) of interest using the public Twitter API.

connector.label: Send Tweet
connector.name: twitter-out
connector.description: Send a tweet to Twitter using the public Twitter API.

connector.label: Publish Features to a Stream Layer
connector.name: stream-layer-output
connector.description: Publish Features in an ESRI JSON format to a web socket for consumption by a Stream Layer

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Receive Text from HTTP
connector.name: http-text-in
connector.description: Description for connector

connector.label: rest-text-in
connector.name: rest-server-text-in
connector.description: rest-text-in

connector.label: Update Multiple Features
connector.name: update-multi-features
connector.description: Update Multiple Features

connector.label: Poll an ArcGIS Server for Features
connector.name: esri-in-poll-feature-service
connector.description: Poll a Feature Service for Features that are translated to Events.

property.label: Time Field to Identify Incremental Updates
property.name: cleanupTimeField

connector.label: Poll an external website for JSON
connector.name: esri-external-json-poll
connector.description: Poll a URL for JSON that can be converted to GeoEvents.

connector.label: Receive Features on a REST endpoint
connector.name: esri-receive-features-rest-in
connector.description: Receive Features as JSON that are then converted to GeoEvents.

connector.label: Receive JSON on a REST endpoint
connector.name: esri-receive-json-rest-in
connector.description: Receive Generic JSON on a REST endpoint

connector.label: Receive JSON on a Web Socket
connector.name: esri-receive-json-websocket-in
connector.description: Receive Generic JSON over a Web Socket

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Receive text from a TCP Socket
connector.name: esri-in-tcp-text-generictext
connector.description: Can also be used to receive simulated GeoEvents sent from GeoEvent Simulator, a utility that comes with GeoEvent Processor.

connector.label: Receive RSS
connector.name: esri-in-http-rss-georss
connector.description: Receives RSS/ATOM feed by polling a URL at a fixed frequency.

connector.label: Receive text from a UDP Socket
connector.name: esri-in-udp-text-generictext
connector.description: Receive text via a UDP socket.

connector.label: Subscribe to an external Web Socket for JSON
connector.name: esri-in-websocket-json-generictext
connector.description: Description for connector

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Watch a folder for new .json files
connector.name: esri-in-folder-json
connector.description: Read in json files from a folder data store

property.label: Use File Names As Track ID
property.name: inputUseFileNamesAsChannelID

connector.label: Watch a folder for new .csv files
connector.name: esri-in-folder-csv
connector.description: Read in csv files from a folder data store

property.label: Use File Names As Track ID
property.name: inputUseFileNamesAsChannelID

connector.label: Publish GeoEvents on a REST endpoint
connector.name: esri-out-cache-rest-cache
connector.description: Creates a REST end point that can be used to query GeoEvents. The URL of the REST endpoint will be http://server:port/geoevent/rest/cache/{output name}?f={text|json|kml|rss}. For example, if you want to retrieve GeoEvents from an output called rest-out in JSON format, the URL would be http://server:port/geoevent/rest/cache/rest-out?f=json. Please refer to the tutorial documentation for the parameters of each format.

connector.label: Push JSON to an external Web Socket
connector.name: esri-out-json-external-websocket
connector.description: Push JSON to an external WebSocket.

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Publish JSON to a Web Socket
connector.name: esri-out-json-websocket
connector.description: Publish JSON to a WebSocket hosted on the same server as GeoEvent Processor

property.label: Remote server web socket URI (Client Mode)
property.name: URI

connector.label: Publish text to a UDP Socket
connector.name: esri-out-udp
connector.description: Send Text to a UDP socket.

connector.label: Push JSON to an external website
connector.name: esri-json-http-external-out
connector.description: Send JSON to an external website using POST method.

connector.label: Send a text message
connector.name: esri-out-message-sms-send
connector.description: Sends a Text message using a formatted message that may contain data values from GeoEvents.

connector.label: Send an email
connector.name: esri-out-message-email-send
connector.description: Sends an email using a formatted message that may contain data values from GeoEvents.

connector.label: Send an instant message
connector.name: esri-out-message-xmpp-im
connector.description: Sends Instant Messages in a specified format, which may include data values from GeoEvents, to an Instant Message chat or room.

connector.label: Add a feature
connector.name: esri-out-json-fs-add
connector.description: Adds GeoEvents to a Feature Layer as new features.

connector.label: Publish text to a TCP Socket
connector.name: esri-out-text-tcp-generictext
connector.description: Sends GeoEvents as text to TCP, so they can be displayed in a client application.

connector.label: Update a Feature
connector.name: esri-out-json-fs-update
connector.description: Updates features in a Feature Layer with the latest status contained in GeoEvents.

connector.label: Write to a .csv file
connector.name: esri-out-csv-file-log
connector.description: Logs GeoEvents to files in a generic text format.

connector.label: Write to a .json file
connector.name: esri-out-json-file-log
connector.description: Logs GeoEvents to files in a JSON format.

connector.label: Send Features to a Stream Service
connector.name: esri-out-feature-stream-service
connector.description: Pushes the events to a Stream Service
